title: BRONZE
body: how the f**k do i get out of bronze.... i literally couldnt not get past b2 with the team mates i keep getting... i cant keep carrying my team all the time whats the best way to get past bronze please somoen help

replies.body:
Play Leona.

She's really good at making plays in lower elo, and getting your team-mates fed. If you're legitimately more skilled than a bronze player, you'll easily be able to win games with her.

This is the Help and Support board, though not that kind of help. This discussion belongs on the [Gameplay & Strategy](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy) board.
